# Product category constants | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Game Controller ](/documentation/gamecontroller)

- [ GCDevice ](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcdevice)

- [ Product category constants ](/documentation/GameController/product-category-constants)

- [ GCDevice ](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcdevice)

-  Product category constants 

API Collection# Product category constants

## [Topics](/documentation/GameController/product-category-constants#topics)

### [Game controller categories](/documentation/GameController/product-category-constants#Game-controller-categories)

[`let GCProductCategoryDualSense: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategorydualsense)The DualSense product category.[`let GCProductCategoryDualShock4: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategorydualshock4)The DualShock 4 product category.[`let GCProductCategoryMFi: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategorymfi)The MFi product category.[`let GCProductCategoryXboxOne: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategoryxboxone)The Xbox product category.[`let GCProductCategoryArcadeStick: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategoryarcadestick)The arcade stick product category.[`let GCProductCategoryHID: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategoryhid)The category for products that support the human interface device (HID) protocol.### [Apple TV remote categories](/documentation/GameController/product-category-constants#Apple-TV-remote-categories)

[`let GCProductCategorySiriRemote1stGen: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategorysiriremote1stgen)The first-generation Siri Remote or first-generation Apple TV Remote product category.[`let GCProductCategorySiriRemote2ndGen: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategorysiriremote2ndgen)The second-generation Siri Remote or second-generation Apple TV Remote product category.[`let GCProductCategoryControlCenterRemote: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategorycontrolcenterremote)The virtual remote in the Control Center on iOS and tvOS devices for controlling the Apple TV.[`let GCProductCategoryUniversalElectronicsRemote: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategoryuniversalelectronicsremote)The product category for a Universal Electronics remote that works with Apple TV.[`let GCProductCategoryCoalescedRemote: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategorycoalescedremote)The Apple TV Remote product category for physical and virtual remotes that Game Center combines into a single device.### [Mouse and keyboard categories](/documentation/GameController/product-category-constants#Mouse-and-keyboard-categories)

[`let GCProductCategoryMouse: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategorymouse)The mouse product category.[`let GCProductCategoryKeyboard: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategorykeyboard)The keyboard product category.### [Spatial categoriess](/documentation/GameController/product-category-constants#Spatial-categoriess)

[`let GCProductCategorySpatialStylus: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategoryspatialstylus)The category for stylus products that support 6DoF tracking on visionOS.[`let GCProductCategorySpatialController: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcproductcategoryspatialcontroller)The category for game controller products that support 6DoF tracking on visionOS.## [See Also](/documentation/GameController/product-category-constants#see-also)

### [Getting device information](/documentation/GameController/product-category-constants#Getting-device-information)

[`var vendorName: String?`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcdevice/vendorname)The manufacturer-provided name for the device, or the user’s name for the device.**Required**

[`var productCategory: String`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcdevice/productcategory)The product category that identifies the type of controller.**Required**
